reviews.review: whichever version of CS you purchase you will not regret it
this game is so great, i die so much that whenever i get a kill it actually raises my self esteem
so far my favorite game and I still play it because of the variety

Counter-Strike: Source is a fps shoot'em up for the PC.With over 72 achievments if you're a guy who likes to get all of the achievments then you will be playing for 100+ hours.CS:S is one of the few games you can use to make maps for itself and Garry's mod.You have a big handful of servers some modded and some not.If you're not a fan of multiplayer you can make a server with NPCs.With lots to do for hours on end on CS:S you may get addicted.Just don't play for 24 hours straight, you might end up like that guy who died from playing 23 hours of WoW or something like that.


Score 8/10

Iconic, forever timeless, Counter-Strike: Source has been a part of my life for years, starting from when I bought it to get textures for garry's mod in middle school. Since then, I have made numerous friends in this game, wasted a bunch of time that I am very glad that I wasted, and gained a favorite game. Even though the more recent glossier Global Offensive is out, I implore everyone to at least give this game a try, for even though it doesn't have skins for the wepons, or a competitive scene, it is still great fun.

Plus this game has custom sprays and Global Offensive doesn't, so suck it CS:GO.
its ok i guess but its not for me
Ehhh questi son giochi veri... Non compratelo però, i server non ci son più, ci giocano in pochi
Einfach geiles Spiel, macht richtig Fun.

This is quite frankly my favourite game ever. I return to it night after night, get jittery if i don't get a CS:S hit for a couple of days. You might like it, you might not. It took me about 4 years to get anything near competent, but it keeps pulling you back in.
Partly, i think its because the rounds are well balanced. Even if you die at the start of a round, the most you'll have to wait is 2 and a half mins before you go off again for the next round, and i like the fact that when you die in a round, thats it, none of that 10 seconds then respawn nonsense that for me kills stone dead most games of this genre.... 
Try it. Have a bit of patience, find a good server (if you're UK i reccomend UKCS servers) and enjoy..
